name: RedBugs
description:
RedBugs is a retro-futuristic platformer.

Your mission is to exterminate xeno-life infestations using the Advanced Plasma Cutter that never.... turns...off.

The good news is that this problem is solved by having anchors which then absorb the beam.

Except when they are not working.

Which they are not.

Strap on your shooty laser thign and explode some bugs!

  • 6 Levels
  • Left & Right arrows to move
  • Up arrow to jump
  • P to pause
  • pressing enter will change the beam colors. This has no effect on the game but it's pretty :)

Gamepad support also available.

This game serves a prelude to Satellite 37 (working title) which should be coming some time in the next year.
